name: MikadoCompare
shortDescription:
Identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data 
 Tool to define the spec/sens of predictions vs. references.

details.label: Genome FASTA file
details.description: Reference annotation file. By def, an index will be crated and saved with the suffix .midx

details.label: targets
details.description:
Select --prediction if prediction file was provided. 
 --self= Flag. If set, the reference will be compared with itself. Useful for understanding how the reference transcripts interact with each other. 
 --internal= Flag. If set, for each gene with more than one transcript isoform each will be compared to the others. Useful for understanding the structural relationships between the transcripts in each gene. 
 --index= Flag. If set, compare will stop after having generated the GFF index for the reference.

details.label: distance
details.description: Maximum distance for a transcript to be considered a polymerase run-on. Default: 2000

details.label: protein coding
details.description: Flag. If set, only transcripts with a CDS (both in reference and prediction) will be considered.

details.label: lenient
details.description: If set, exonic statistics will be calculated leniently in the TMAP as well - ie they will consider an exon as match even if only the internal junction has been recovered.

details.label: esclude utr
details.description: Flag. If set, reference and prediction transcripts will be stripped of their UTRs (if they are coding).
